alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:37AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gulf, Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 100 AM EDT/MIDNIGHT CDT/... At 1236 AM EDT/1136 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Stonemill Creek, or 18 miles south of Blountstown, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Red Oak, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chipola Cutoff, Central City, Red Hill, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Center Lake, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Frink, Kinard and Lewis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
